Commands.Shell: Party: 5 turns MAG Damage ResistParty: Grants BRV based on own ATK
Commands.Protect: Party: 5 turns PHY Damage ResistParty: Grants BRV based on own ATK

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Bravery Shell: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Shell.
Artifacts.Bravery Protect: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Protect.

Passives.Shell BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Shell.
Passives.Shell Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Shell.
Passives.Shell Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Shell.
Passives.Protect Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Protect.
Passives.Protect Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Protect.
Passives.Bonus Longer Protect: Grants +1 turn to all allies' Protect buff after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Shell Charge: Increases the max uses of Shell by 1.
Passives.Protect Charge: Increases the max uses of Protect by 1.
Passives.Symbol of Hope: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.
Passives.Speed Shell: Slightly raises SPD while MAG Damage Resist active

Passives.Protect Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while PHY Damage Resist active
Passives.Protect Extension: Protect use +1When using Protect:• Slight BRV increase based on ATK• Slight PHY Damage Resist boost• BRV Attack becomes powerful BRV Attack+ while PHY Damage Resist active
